The sole source of the claim: Lewis Kasman, a former mob associate, stated that he had no knowledge of Attorney General William Barr visiting the prison where Epstein was held.
The quote attributed to Kasman: which sparked the claim, was taken out of context and appeared at the bottom of a story about the inner workings of the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Other websites and articles have used th: without providing any additional evidence to support the claim.
Despite Barr being in New York City on t: there is no evidence to suggest that he made a secret visit to the prison.
